\subsection{Description détaillée}
Easy\+S\+D\+L\+: Encryption / Decryption management A\+E\+S 256bits. 

\begin{DoxyAuthor}{Auteur}
T\+A\+H\+R\+I Ahmed 
\end{DoxyAuthor}
\begin{DoxyVersion}{Version}
0.\+9 
\end{DoxyVersion}
\begin{DoxyDate}{Date}
08-\/02-\/2015
\end{DoxyDate}
Easy\+S\+D\+L est une extension de la librairie S\+D\+L standard public domain code; Open\+S\+S\+L E\+V\+P apis. Started by Saju Pillai (\href{mailto:saju.pillai@gmail.com}{\tt saju.\+pillai@gmail.\+com}) Changed, adapted \& improved by T\+A\+H\+R\+I Ahmed () 

\subsection{Documentation des fonctions}
\hypertarget{aes_8c_a63ceff76b4f55f38d68b116c517a371b}{\index{aes.\+c@{aes.\+c}!aes\+\_\+init@{aes\+\_\+init}}
\index{aes\+\_\+init@{aes\+\_\+init}!aes.\+c@{aes.\+c}}
\subsubsection[{aes\+\_\+init}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}int aes\+\_\+init (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{unsigned char $\ast$}]{key\+\_\+data, }
\item[{int}]{key\+\_\+data\+\_\+len, }
\item[{unsigned char $\ast$}]{salt, }
\item[{E\+V\+P\+\_\+\+C\+I\+P\+H\+E\+R\+\_\+\+C\+T\+X $\ast$}]{e\+\_\+ctx, }
\item[{E\+V\+P\+\_\+\+C\+I\+P\+H\+E\+R\+\_\+\+C\+T\+X $\ast$}]{d\+\_\+ctx}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{aes_8c_a63ceff76b4f55f38d68b116c517a371b}
Create an 256 bit key and I\+V using the supplied key\+\_\+data. salt can be added for taste. Fills in the encryption and decryption ctx objects and returns 0 on success
